name: Ollie Dunn
heading: PRAYER
about: What is Salah (salat)? Salah (salat) is the Arabic term for the ritual prayer that is obligatory for Muslims to perform five times a day.

name: Wiley Battle
heading: PHYSICAL EXERCISE
about: Physical exercise is the performance of some activity in order to develop or maintain physical fitness and overall health.

name: Haney Webster
heading: COOKING
about: Cooking, cookery, or culinary arts is the art, science and craft of using heat to prepare food for consumption. Cooking techniques and ingredients vary widely.

name: Hull Wilcox
heading: EATING
about: Eating (also known as consuming) is the ingestion of food, typically to provide a heterotrophic organism with energy and to allow for growth.

name: Crane House
heading: CLEANING
about: Cleaning is the process of removing unwanted substances, such as dirt, infectious agents, and other impurities, from an object or environment.

name: Bertha Freeman
heading: GARDENING
about: Gardening is the practice of growing and cultivating plants as part of horticulture. In gardens, ornamental plants are often grown for their flowers, foliage, or overall appearance.

name: Bertha Freeman
heading: STUDY
about: Studying is not just important for educational development, but also builds personal skills. Having good study skills can improve your confidence, competence, and self-esteem.
